name: Pozzolana Portland Cement (PPC)
material: Calcined lime, Clay and Reactive silica
description: Pozzolana Portland Cement (PPC) in Shankar Cement is a blended cement made by mixing clinker with pozzolanic materials like fly ash. It offers enhanced durability, reduced permeability, and improved resistance to chemical attacks. PPC is ideal for construction in aggressive environments, offering better workability and long-term strength development. It is also environmentally friendly, reducing carbon emissions by incorporating industrial by-products.

name: Kamdhenu 12mm TMT Bars
description: Kamdhenu 12mm TMT Bars are high-strength, thermo-mechanically treated steel bars used in construction. They offer excellent ductility, tensile strength, and resistance to corrosion, making them ideal for reinforced concrete structures. These bars undergo a special quenching process, enhancing their durability and performance under extreme conditions. Kamdhenu 12mm TMT Bars ensure superior quality, safety, and longevity in building and infrastructure projects.

name: HAVELLS wires
description: Havells wires are high-quality electrical cables designed for safe and efficient power transmission. They are made from pure copper or aluminum conductors, ensuring excellent conductivity and minimal energy loss. Known for their durability, flexibility, and fire-resistant properties, Havells wires are ideal for residential, commercial, and industrial applications. These wires also comply with international safety standards, providing reliable performance in various electrical systems.

name: TRS sand
description: TRS Construction Sand is a high-quality, finely graded sand used for various construction purposes. With its clean and fine particles, TRS Construction Sand helps achieve a smooth finish and enhances the overall quality of the building structures.

name: Red Bricks
description: Red construction bricks are traditional building materials made from clay, fired at high temperatures to achieve strength and durability. Known for their rich red color, these bricks are commonly used in the construction of walls, foundations, and other structural elements. They offer excellent thermal insulation, fire resistance, and long-lasting performance. Red bricks are also environmentally friendly, made from natural materials, and provide an aesthetic appeal with their classic look.

name: Rolling Mild Steel Beam
description: Rolling Mild Steel Beams are structural steel components widely used in construction for framing and support in buildings, bridges, and other infrastructure projects. Made from mild steel, these beams are known for their flexibility, strength, and durability. They are shaped through a rolling process to create various profiles, such as I-beams or H-beams, offering excellent load-bearing capacity. Rolling Mild Steel Beams are corrosion-resistant and can withstand heavy loads, making them ideal for long-lasting and stable structural applications.
